title: Modern stencil font needing identification
content:
Hi everyone,

Anyone know which two fonts are used on this packaging?

Thanks in advance!

Jason

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145155im_/http:/typophile.com/files/which%20font_3946.jpg)

Font: 

 Geogrotesque Stencil 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145155/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [which font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145155/http:/typophile.com/files/which%20font_2.jpg) | 144.45 KB |
author: jbm15

comments.content:
Geogrotesque Stencil C Medium appears to be a match for the stencil:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emtype/geogrotesque-stencil/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145155/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emtype/geogrotesque-stencil/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emtype/geogrotesque-stencil/")

Still working on the sans serif....

The small one looks like Akkurat.  
 [http://lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145155/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/ "http://lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/")
You people are totally awesome. Thank you. Saved me a lot of time! All the best to you..
